siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

brainNote.title: Are Data Unions the Future of Data?

frontmatter.title: Are Data Unions the Future of Data?

childMdx.excerpt: Actually it's worse than dislocated – our narratives and metaphors around data are determined to convince us it  needs no location  because it is  immaterial . It lives in  "The Cloud."  It doesn't…

Actually it's worse than dislocated – our narratives and metaphors around data are determined to convince us it  needs no location  because it is  immaterial . It lives in  "The Cloud."  It doesn't have a geographical home. It floats about as small fluffy terrabytes circling the…
